EmailTemplate.name: Sierra Leone Meetup
EmailTemplate.subject: CommCare Meetup in Freetown this Friday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
Dimagi will be hosting a CommCare meetup in Freetown for current CommCare users and organizations interested in using CommCare in Sierra Leone this Friday, August 21st.
CommCare (www.commcarehq.org) is a free, open source platform that enables non-programmers to build their own mobile apps for their frontline programs. During the free meetup, attendees will:
Learn about ways organizations can build their capacity to deploy CommCare Hear from other organizations in Sierra Leone that are using CommCare Watch a demo of a CommCare application used in Ebola Response
Organizations currently deploying CommCare or interested in learning more about deploying CommCare are invited to attend. Please see meetup information below:
Date: Friday, August 21st; 12-2pm local time Location: BRAC office, 174 Wilkinson Road Opposite Freetown Supermarket Cost: Free!
If you're planning on attending, please RSVP here!
Have questions? Please reply to Andrea Fletcher afletcher@dimagi.com as she is currently in Sierra Leone. On behalf of the Dimagi team, we look forward to meeting you in Freetown!
Sincerely,
Christina Jeffrey
